title: The painter and the pendulum
description: TED visits Tom Shannon in his Manhattan studio for an intimate look at his science-inspired art. An eye-opening, personal conversation with John Hockenberry reveals how nature's forces -- and the onset of Parkinson's tremors -- interact in his life and craft.
author: Tom Shannon, John Hockenberry
keywords: TED, talks, art, astronomy, creativity, illness, science, space
